name: Spacepace
body:
### SpacePace
Spacepace is an android application/game made with cocos2d-x. The goal is to avoid enemy spacecraft, whilst getting as far as you can. Movement of the ship is dependent on the device accelerometer.

### Links
You may download SpacePace for Android on the Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ahewdev.spacepace

### Contributors & Authors
@alec-hewitt is the main contributor to this project.
You may visit my website here! www.ahewdev.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
